argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | idfuval.i | |- I = ( idFunc ` C ) |
| 2 |  | idfuval.b | |- B = ( Base ` C ) |
| 3 |  | idfuval.c | |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) |
| 4 |  | idfu1.x | |- ( ph -> X e. B ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_idfu1st | |- ( ph -> ( 1st ` I ) = ( _I |` B ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_fveq1d | |- ( ph -> ( ( 1st ` I ) ` X ) = ( ( _I |` B ) ` X ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_fvresi | |- ( X e. B -> ( ( _I |` B ) ` X ) = X ) |
| 8 | 4, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( ( _I |` B ) ` X ) = X ) |
| 9 | 6, 8 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ph -> ( ( 1st ` I ) ` X ) = X ) |
